message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product for $9000. I think it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $7500?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss a price of $8200?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $7800?
I understand you're still looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a fair profit. How about we meet at $8100?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $7900?
